aquatic-back-02.description: Disable critical strikes on this Axie during this round.

aquatic-back-04.description: Draw a card if target is in Last Stand.

aquatic-back-06.description: Apply Speed+ to this Axie for 2 rounds when attacked.

aquatic-back-08.description: Apply Attack+ to this Axie if its shield breaks.

aquatic-back-10.description: Successful attacks restore 50 HP for each Anemone part this Axie posseses.

aquatic-back-12.description: Prioritize idle target when comboed with at least 2 additional cards.

aquatic-horn-02.description: Deal 130% damage when attacking an idle target.

aquatic-horn-04.description: Add 30% to this Axie's shield when attacking.

aquatic-horn-06.description: Apply Attack+ to this Axie when attacking Beast, Bug, or Mech targets.

aquatic-horn-08.description: Successful attacks restore 50 HP for each Anemone part this Axie posseses.

aquatic-horn-12.description: Target cannot enter Last Stand if this card brings its HP to zero.

aquatic-mouth-02.description: Deal 120% damage if this Axie's HP is below 50%.

aquatic-mouth-04.description: Heal this Axie by the damage inflicted with this card.

aquatic-mouth-08.description: Apply Attack+ to this Axie when attacking Plant, Reptile, or Dusk targets.

aquatic-mouth-10.description: Target injured enemy if this Axie's HP is below 50%.

aquatic-tail-02.description: Apply Speed+ to this Axie for 2 rounds when comboed with another Aquatic class card.

aquatic-tail-04.description: Gain 1 energy when comboed with another card.

aquatic-tail-06.description: Apply Jinx to target for 2 rounds.

aquatic-tail-08.description: Apply Chill to target for 2 rounds.

aquatic-tail-10.description: Deal 120% damage if this Axie attacks first.

beast-back-02.description: Guaranteed critical strike when comboed with at least 2 other cards.

beast-back-04.description: Draw a card when attacking an Aquatic, Bird, or Dawn target.

beast-back-06.description: Always strike first if this Axie is in Last Stand.

beast-back-08.description: Deal 150% damage if this Axie is in Last Stand.

beast-back-10.description: Add Shield equal to the damage this cards deals to Plant targets.

beast-horn-02.description: Increase crit chance by 20% if chained or comboed with a plant card.

beast-horn-04.description: Gain 1 energy per critical strike dealt by your team this round.

beast-horn-06.description: Add 20% shield to this Axie when played in a chain.

beast-horn-08.description: Deal 10% additional damage for each allied Bug Axie.

beast-horn-12.description: Apply speed+ to this Axie for 2 rounds when attacking.

beast-mouth-02.description: Deal 120% damage when comboed with another 'Nut Cracker' card.

beast-mouth-08.description: Apply Lethal to target if this Axie's HP is below 30%.

beast-mouth-10.description: Apply 2 Morale+ to this Axie for 2 rounds.

beast-tail-04.description: Steal 1 energy from your opponent when comboed with another card.

beast-tail-06.description: Apply Morale+ to your team for 2 rounds if this Axie attacks while in Last Stand.

beast-tail-08.description: Draw a card if this Axie attacks at the beginning of the round.

beast-tail-10.description: Deal 120% damage when comboed with another 'Nut Cracker' card.

beast-tail-12.description: Skip the closest target if there are 2 or more enemies remaining.

bird-back-02.description: Apply Fear to target for 1 turn. If defending, apply Fear to self until next round.

bird-back-04.description: Apply Morale- to enemy for 2 rounds.

bird-back-06.description: Apply Jinx to target for 2 rounds.

bird-back-08.description: Transfer all debuffs on this Axie to target.

bird-back-10.description: Target an Aquatic class enemy if this Axie's HP is below 50%

bird-back-12.description: Attack twice if this Axie has any debuffs.

bird-horn-02.description: Apply Aroma on this Axie until next round.

bird-horn-06.description: Deal 120% damage when chained with another "Trump" card.

bird-horn-08.description: Disable target's horn cards next round.

bird-horn-10.description: Skip the closest target if there are 2 or more enemies remaining.

bird-horn-12.description: Deal 120% damage when chained with another "Lunge" card.

bird-mouth-08.description: Target Bug class enemy if this Axie's HP is below 50%.

bird-tail-02.description: Deal 120% damage if this Axie attacks first.

bird-tail-04.description: Add 20% shield to this Axie for each debuff it possesses.

bird-tail-08.description: Skip targets that are in Last Stand.

bird-tail-10.description: Apply Chill to target for 2 rounds.

bird-tail-12.description: Inflict 30% of this Axie's max HP to itself.

bug-back-02.description: Stun attacker if this Axie’s shield breaks. Can only trigger once per round.

bug-back-04.description: Apply 2 poison to target when played in a chain.

bug-back-08.description: Deal 50% more damage when attacking Bug targets.

bug-back-10.description: Target cannot be healed until next round.

bug-back-12.description: Apply Fragile to target until next round.

bug-horn-02.description: Apply Speed- to target for 2 rounds.

bug-horn-04.description: Steal energy from your opponent when chained with another "Bug Signal" card.

bug-horn-08.description: Deal 30% more damage to shielded targets.

bug-horn-10.description: Randomly discard 1 card from your enemy's hand.

bug-horn-12.description: Gain 1 energy when comboed with a plant card.

bug-mouth-02.description: Heal this Axie by the damage inflicted with this card.

bug-mouth-04.description: Randomly discard 1 card from your enemy's hand.

bug-mouth-08.description: Apply Fear to target for 2 turns when played in a Chain.

bug-mouth-10.description: Add 100% more damage when comboed with another card.

bug-tail-02.description: Apply Stench to enemy for 1 round.

bug-tail-04.description: Attack twice when comboed with another card.

bug-tail-06.description: Apply stun when struck by Aquatic or Bird class cards. Can only trigger once per round.

bug-tail-08.description: Disable target's melee cards next round.

bug-tail-10.description: Deal 200% damage when attacking in Last stand. Axie's Last Stand ends after it attacks.

plant-back-02.description: Target a bird if comboed with 2 or more cards.

plant-back-06.description: Remove all debuffs from this Axie.

plant-back-08.description: Gain 1 energy if this Axie is struck by an Aquatic card.

plant-back-10.description: Remove all debuffs from a teammate if its directly in front (same row) of this Axie.

plant-back-12.description: Draw a card if this Axie's shield doesn't break this round.

plant-horn-02.description: Increased 20% damage when chained with another plant card.

plant-horn-04.description: Deal 120% damage if this Axie's shield breaks.

plant-horn-08.description: Heal front teammate for 270 HP. If there are no front teammates, heal this Axie instead.

plant-horn-10.description: Deal 120% damage if this Axie attacks last.

plant-mouth-02.description: Steal 1 energy from your opponent when comboed with another card.

plant-mouth-04.description: Heal this Axie by the damage this card inflicts.

plant-mouth-08.description: Heal this Axie by the damage this card inflicts on a Plant target.

plant-tail-02.description: Gain 1 energy if this Axie's shield breaks. Can only trigger once per round.

plant-tail-04.description: Draw a card if struck by a Beast, Bug, or Mech card.

plant-tail-06.description: When hit, disable the attacker's ranged cards next round.

plant-tail-08.description: Apply poison each time this card is used to attack or defend.

plant-tail-10.description: Cannot be targeted by Aquatic cards if this Axie has teammates remaining.

plant-tail-12.description: Disable target's mouth cards next round.

reptile-back-02.description: Draw a card if this Axie's shield breaks.

reptile-back-04.description: Target enemy with lowest shield when comboed with 2 or more cards.

reptile-back-06.description: Double shield from this card when comboed with a plant card.

reptile-back-08.description: Reflect 40% of melee damage back at attacker.

reptile-back-10.description: Add 15% of this Axie's shield to adjacent teammates.

reptile-back-12.description: Appy Speed- to target for 2 rounds.

reptile-horn-02.description: Apply Stench to target until end of round.

reptile-horn-04.description: Deal 120% damage when chained with another "lunge" card.

reptile-horn-06.description: Deal 130% damage if target is faster than this Axie.

reptile-horn-08.description: Reflect 50% of ranged damage back at attacker.

reptile-horn-10.description: Apply speed- to target for 2 rounds.

reptile-mouth-04.description: Gain 1 energy if target is faster than this Axie.

reptile-mouth-08.description: Heal this Axie by damage inflicted with this card to Aquatic targets.

reptile-mouth-10.description: Apply Stun to enemy when comboed with at least 2 additional cards.

reptile-tail-02.description: Reduce damage taken by 15% this round.

reptile-tail-04.description: Generate 1 energy when attacking a buffed target.

reptile-tail-08.description: Attacks that break this Axie’s shield cannot do additional damage. Can only trigger once per round.
